root.name: Karaoke Revolution Volume 2
root.description: Soundtrack"...Baby One More Time" by Britney Spears"Born to Be Wild" by Steppenwolf"Cry" by Faith Hill"Drift Away" by Uncle Kracker"Every Breath You Take" by the Police"Friends in Low Places" by Garth Brooks"Genie in a Bottle" by Christina Aguilera"Heartbreak Hotel" by Elvis Presley"Here Without You" by 3 Doors Down"Hot Stuff" by Donna Summer"I Believe in a Thing Called Love" by the Darkness"I Hate (Everything About You)" by Three Days Grace"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor"Irresistible" by Jessica Simpson"It's My Life" by No Doubt"I'll Make Love to You" by Boyz II Men"I'm With You" by Avril Lavigne"Jessie's Girl" by Rick Springfield"Lady Marmalade" by Patti LaBelle"Let's Get It On" by Marvin Gaye"Miss You" by Aaliyah"My Girl" by the Temptations"Papa Don't Preach" by Madonna"Perfect" by Simple Plan"Rock and Roll All Nite" by Kiss"(Sittin' On) the Dock of the Bay" by Otis Redding"Sweet Home Alabama" by Lynyrd Skynyrd"The First Cut Is the Deepest" by Sheryl Crow"The Joker" by Steve Miller"Toxic" by Britney Spears"We Are Family" by Sister Sledge"White Flag" by Dido"I've Got You Under My Skin" by Frank Sinatra (Secret Song)"Rich Girl" by Hall Oates (Secret Song)"Virtual Insanity" by Jamiroquai (Secret Song)
